languages.text: "Ты появилась на свет благодаря мне. Выжила — благодаря мне! И здесь ты тоже по моей воле. Склонись предо мной! Скажи то, что я желаю услышать, и твои страдания тут же закончатся. Ну же, Дитя... Я столько лет ждала. Подчинись мне!"

traits.locale_text: "Ты появилась на свет благодаря мне. Выжила — благодаря мне! И здесь ты тоже по моей воле. Склонись предо мной! Скажи чо, чего я желаю услышать, и твои страдания тут же закончатся. Ну же, Дитя... Дитя-Дитя-ДИТЯ-Дииии-тяяяя... Я столько лет ждала. Подчинись мне!"

languages.text: "You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now — because I have willed it so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go on, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"
languages.original_text: "Ты появилась на свет благодаря мне. Выжила — благодаря мне! И здесь ты тоже по моей воле. Склонись предо мной! Скажи то, что я желаю услышать, и твои страдания тут же закончатся. Ну же, Дитя... Я столько лет ждала. Подчинись мне!"

traits.locale_text: "You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now — because I have willed so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go ahead, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"

"You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now — because I have willed so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go ahead, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"

"You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now—because I have willed so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go ahead, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"

"You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now—because I have willed so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go ahead, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"

"You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now — because I have willed it so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go on, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"

"You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now — because I have willed it so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go on, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"

languages.text: 「お前の命は私のためにある。お前は私のために生き残ったのだ！そして今ここにいるのは…私がそう願ったからだ。私に従え！私が望む言葉を言えば、その苦しみを終わらせてやろう。さあ言え、御子よ…ずいぶん待ったのだ。私に服従せよ！」
languages.original_text: "You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now — because I have willed it so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go on, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の命は私のためにある。お前は私のために生き残ったのだ！そして今ここにいるのは…私がそう願ったからだ。私に従え！私が望む言葉を言えば、その苦しみを終わらせてやろう。さあ言え、御子よ…ずいぶん待ったのだ。私に服従せよ！」

languages.text: “你之所以能诞生，都是因为我！你之所以能活下来，都是因为我！你来到了这里，因为这是我的意愿。在我面前跪下！只要你说出我想听的话，你的痛苦就会结束。来吧，孩子……我已经等了太久！臣服于我吧！”
languages.original_text: "You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now — because I have willed it so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go on, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"

traits.locale_text: “你之所以能诞生，都是因为我！你之所以能活下来，都是因为我！你来到了这里，因为这是我的意愿。在我面前跪下！只要你说出我想听的话，你的痛苦就会结束。来吧，孩子……我已经等了太久！臣服于我吧！”

languages.text: « Tu me dois la vie. Si tu as survécu, c'est grâce à moi ! Et si tu es là, c'est parce que je l'ai voulu. Incline-toi devant moi ! Dis-moi ce que je veux entendre, et je mettrai un terme à tes souffrances. Allez, Enfant... J'attends depuis si longtemps. Soumets-toi ! »
languages.original_text: "You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now — because I have willed it so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go on, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"

traits.locale_text: « Tu me dois la vie. Si tu as survécu, c'est grâce à moi ! Et si tu es là, c'est parce que je l'ai voulu. Incline-toi devant moi ! Dis-moi ce que je veux entendre, et je mettrai un terme à tes souffrances. Allez, mon enfant... J'attends depuis si longtemps. Soumets-toi ! »

languages.text: «Se te concedió la vida gracias a mí. ¡Sobreviviste gracias a mí! Y ahora estás aquí porque tal es mi voluntad. ¡Inclínate ante mí! Dime lo que quiero oír, y pondré fin a tu sufrimiento. Adelante, niña... Llevo mucho tiempo esperando. ¡Sométete!».
languages.original_text: "You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now — because I have willed it so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go on, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"

traits.locale_text: «Se te concedió la vida gracias a mí. ¡Sobreviviste gracias a mí! Y ahora estás aquí porque tal es mi voluntad. ¡Inclínate ante mí! Dime lo que quiero oír, y pondré fin a tu sufrimiento. Adelante, niña... Llevo mucho tiempo esperando. ¡Sométete!».

languages.text: "Euch wurde nur meinetwegen das Leben gegeben. Ihr habt nur meinetwegen überlebt! Und hier seid Ihr nun — weil ich es so wollte. Verneigt Euch vor mir! Erzählt mir, was ich hören möchte, dann wird Euer Leid enden. Nur zu, Kind ... Ich habe so lange gewartet. Unterwerft Euch mir!"
languages.original_text: "You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now — because I have willed it so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go on, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Euch wurde nur meinetwegen das Leben gegeben. Ihr habt nur meinetwegen überlebt! Und hier seid Ihr nun — weil ich es so wollte. Verneigt Euch vor mir! Erzählt mir, was ich hören möchte, dann wird Euer Leid enden. Nur zu, Kind ... Ich habe so lange gewartet. Unterwerft Euch mir!"

languages.text: "Sana benim sayemde can verildi. Benim sayemde hayatta kaldın! Buraya da ben istediğim için geldin... Karşımda diz çök! Bana duymak istediğimi söylersen ızdırabın son bulur. Hadi Çocuk... Çok bekledim. Bana itaat et!"
languages.original_text: "You were given life because of me. You survived because of me! And here you are now — because I have willed it so. Bow before me! Tell me what I wish to hear, and your suffering will end. Go on, Child... I have waited for so long. Submit to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Sana benim sayemde can verildi. Benim sayemde hayatta kaldın! Buraya da ben istediğim için geldin... Karşımda diz çök! Bana duymak istediğimi söylersen çektiğin ızdırap son bulacak. Hadi Çocuk... Çok bekledim. Bana itaat et!"
